l3fw.c File Reference

This file contains the implementation of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of L3FW. This also contains some related macros. More...

#include <ti/csl/csl_l3fw.h>

Detailed Description

This file contains the implementation of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of L3FW. This also contains some related macros.

Function Documentation

void L3FWAddAllRegionMRMPermissions ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  regionId 
)

This API will allow read and write access for all masters to a region for L3FW.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionIdRegion ID to enable.
Returns
None.
static void L3FWAllowTransactions ( uint32_t  baseAddr)
static

This API will allow transactions to reach the slave NIU. This API is called after updating configuration registers.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
Returns
None.
static void L3FWBlockTransactions ( uint32_t  baseAddr)
static

This API will block transactions to reach the slave NIU. This API is called before updating configuration registers.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
Returns
None.
void L3FWClearErrorInfo ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  portNum 
)

This API will clear error information for L3FW Module for given port number.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
portNumPort number.
Returns
None.
void L3FWDisableRegion ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  regionId,
uint32_t  portNum 
)

This API will disable region for port for L3FW.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionIdRegion ID to disable.
portNumPort number for which region is to disable.
Returns
None.
void L3FWEnableRegion ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  regionId,
uint32_t  portNum 
)

This API will enable region for port for L3FW.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionIdRegion ID to enable.
portNumPort number for which region is to enable.
Returns
None.
void L3FWGetErrorInfo ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  portNum,
l3fwRegionErrorStatus_t *  errorInfo 
)

This API will read and return error information for L3FW Module for given port number.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
portNumPort number.
errorInfoError information. Refer enum l3fwRegionErrorStatus_t.
Returns
None.
void L3FWGetRegionMRMPermission ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  regionId,
uint32_t  connId,
uint32_t *  pAccessType 
)

This API will enable/disable read/write access to a region for L3FW.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionIdRegion ID to enable.
connIdMaster's connId for which permission is to set.
pAccessTypePointer to variable which will be updated with current permissions. Refer enum l3fwMRMRWPermission_t.
Returns
None.
void L3FWGetRegionParams ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
l3fwRegionConfigParams_t *  regionParams 
)

This API will read and return configured region parameters for L3FW Module. User should provide L3FW and region ID initialized in the structure which is passed as an argument.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionParamsConfiguration parameters for region. Refer enum l3fwRegionConfigParams_t. For Region 0 Start and End Address is returned as 0.
Returns
None.
void L3FWRemoveAllRegionMRMPermissions ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  regionId 
)

This API will remove read and write access for all masters to a region for L3FW.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionIdRegion ID to enable.
Returns
None.
void L3FWResetAllRegions ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will reset all configuration for L3FW. It will enable full access to all masters.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
Returns
None.
void L3FWSetRegionMRMPermission ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  regionId,
uint32_t  connId,
uint32_t  accessType 
)

This API will enable/disable read/write access to a region for L3FW.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionIdRegion ID to enable.
connIdMaster's connId for which permission is to set.
accessTypeRead/Write or both permissions for given region. Refer enum l3fwMRMRWPermission_t.
Returns
None.
void L3FWSetRegionParams ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const l3fwRegionConfigParams_t *  regionParams 
)

This API will configure region for L3FW Module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionParamsConfiguration parameters for region. Refer enum l3fwRegionConfigParams_t.
Returns
None.
